column4: I have just installed Ubuntu 7.04 on my new acer 4520 laptop. no sound is coming on music or video. I installed the drivers that totem player recommended. but still not working
video pictures are coming, but no sound from it
how do I find that out?
many ways , you can use gnome-control-center i guess , will show you the card details and the driver used
and when I press the "Test" buttons nothing happens.
what sound card do you have again?
and checking if anything is muted?
it runs, i increase decrease sound but nothing happens
do an lsmod and see what modules are loaded , may give you a clue
snd_mixer_oss, snd_hda_intel, snd_hda_codec, snd_pcm_oss, snd_pcm, snd_seq_dummy, .. snd_seq
